code: import React from'react';import images from"../../assets/images";import Button from"../Button";import Styles from'./HeaderTop.model.scss';import classNames from"classnames/bind";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";const cx=classNames.bind(Styles);function HeaderTop(_ref){let{isLogin,isInLoginPage,href}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogout=()=>{if(isLogin){const token=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token'));const request={method:'DELETE',headers:{'accept':'*/*','authorization':'Bearer '+token.accessToken}};fetch("https://agiletech-test-api.zeabur.app/auth/logout",request).then(res=>res.text()).then(data=>{navigate("/");localStorage.removeItem("token");}).catch(fail=>console.log(fail));}else{navigate("/login");}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"header-top"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"logo"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:images.logo,alt:"logo"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"btn ".concat(isInLoginPage?'dp-none':''," ").concat(!isLogin?'only':'')},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{primary:true,disabled:!isLogin,href:"/profile"},"Profile"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{primary:true,onClick:handleLogout},isLogin?'Log out':'Sign In')));}export default HeaderTop;
